ingredients.item: 400g cavolo nero, stalks discarded and leaves cut into 6-8cm pieces
2 red chillies, quartered, deseeded and cut into 2cm-long pieces

instructions.step: Blanch the cavolo nero in a pan of boiling salted water for 1 minute, then drain. Meanwhile, stir together the vinegar, soy and sugar; set aside.

Heat both oils together in a wok or frying pan, then stir-fry the garlic and the whole and chopped chillies for 1 minute. Add the cavolo nero and soy mixture and cook for 2 minutes. Serve, but donâ€™t eat the whole chillies. SF
